title: Review a Grant Application
description: A program officer is reviewing a submitted grant application to score it against a rubric.

tasks.description: Open the submitted grant application and all its attachments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer has the complete application package for review.

tasks.description: Score the application against the program's official scoring rubric (e.g., project impact, budget reasonableness, organizational capacity).
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer systematically scores each section of the application.

tasks.description: Submit the score and any comments into the grant management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The officer saves their review and score, moving the application to the next stage.
